text:
This issue is to remember to add / update JMX files for following bugs:
- Test plan for 59067 and 58983 (2 differents cases)
- 58881 : Add a Plan (we need to either point to external sites or see what can be done)
- 58950 : We would need a Jetty or Tomcat with KeepAlive set to 2s
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
